roleset.name: cause to fall down, causing to fall down or touch the ground

example.name: down-v: the bigger they are....
example.text: WHEN HURRICANE Hugo careened through the Caribbean and the Atlantic coast states, it downed electric and telephone lines, shot coconuts through cottage rooftops, shattered windows and uprooted thousands of lives.

example.name: downing-n
example.text: Strong storms that moved through the Dallas area on Saturday afternoon produced several microbursts, downing power lines
example.arg: Strong storms that moved through the Dallas area on Saturday afternoon

roleset.note: DOWN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'down' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Ingestion. (from down.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: eat, consuming, finishing off

example.name: down-v: growing boy
example.text: In one sitting, John downed a bag of Oreos, three pints of Ben& Jerry's, a whole watermelon, half a keg of beer, and a pound of jellybeans, but he passed on the"wafer-thin mints".
example.arg: a bag of Oreos, three pints of Ben& Jerry's, a whole watermelon, half a keg of beer, and a pound of jellybeans,

roleset.note: DOWN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'down' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Ingestion. (from down.02-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: downward, low, reduced
roleset.note: DOWN-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from down.01-j)

roleset.name: perform oral sex

example.name: go_down_on-v
example.text: Wasn't that the first time [0]-1 you went down on me *-1?

roleset.note: GO_DOWN_ON NOTES: Added by Julia for ICE.
